Title: Fullmetal Alchemist
Writer: Hiromu Arakawa (manga), Fumihiko Sori (screenplay), Hiromu Arakawa (creator), Hiromu Arakawa (story), Takeshi Miyamoto (screenplay), Tyler Rhoads
Actors: Ryôsuke Yamada, Tsubasa Honda, Dean Fujioka, Ryûta Satô
Plot: Two alchemist brothers go on a quest for the Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their dead mother goes horribly wrong.
